#summary &boxdl; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxdl;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxDL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2557/index.htm U+02557].
  * `&boxDl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2556/index.htm U+02556].
  * `&boxdL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2555/index.htm U+02555].
  * `&boxdl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2510/index.htm U+02510].
